data.name: Black Squad - AXMC FIRST RELEASE PACKAGE
data.detailed_description:
AXMC First Release Package!
Equip yourself with the very first AXMC skin series.

[PACKAGE LIST]
AXMC INFERNO BOLT (permanent)
AXMC (permanent)

*AXMC INFERNO BOLT is exclusive.
*This package is only available until the official release of Black Squad!

data.short_description: AXMC First Release Package! Equip yourself with the very first AXMC skin series.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Portuguese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
